mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Footprints" and etc; 02 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 28; "Footprints" and "The Detection of Crime"; Handwritten notes regarding articles from Detective Mag of July 21, 1923 and Central Press of April 18, 1910. The first discusses the way men walk and their footprints. The latter regards Faulds getting recognition for his work.; 2 leaves; DF 871
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Criminal investigation
Faulds, Henry, 18431930
